name: Kovetous Kobolds
description:
SYNOPSIS

Dig, build and burrow! Compete against up to 4 other players to get your ore to your goal before anyone else can in this classic arcade style versus game!

WHAT IS KOVETOUS KOBOLDS?

Kovetous Kobolds is 2-4 player arcade style versus game. Though deceptively simple, this title offers a surprising amount of depth in its frantic moment-to-moment gameplay!

DIG through blocks and crack open chests with your Pickaxe!

BUILD using the blocks you've picked up, or lay traps for your competing Kobolds to fall victim to!

BURROW away from other players or harmful environmental effects to evade damage, as well as to traverse beneath blocks!

COLLECT various pickups through chests to give yourself an edge over your opponents!

WIN by cracking open the mysterious ore in the center of each map. This gives your pickaxe the power it needs to collect 1 of the 3 ores that match your Kobold's color! Bring all 3 of them back to your spawn point first to win!

PLAY on 3 different style maps! The first is a no-frills battle arena, the second introduces spaces that periodically have rockslides, the third contains many explosions!

This game plays best with a controller, preferably one with a good D-Pad. Kovetous Kobolds currently supports most commonly used USB controllers from the recent few console generations. It also supports GCN Controllers, drivers not included.
